title: types
content: # `fastmcp.resources.types` Concrete resource implementations. ## Classes ### `TextResource` A resource that reads from a string. **Methods:** #### `read` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} read(self) -> str ``` Read the text content. ### `BinaryResource` A resource that reads from bytes. **Methods:** #### `read` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} read(self) -> bytes ``` Read the binary content. ### `FileResource` A resource that reads from a file. Set is\_binary=True to read file as binary data instead of text. **Methods:** #### `validate_absolute_path` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} validate_absolute_path(cls, path: Path) -> Path ``` Ensure path is absolute. #### `set_binary_from_mime_type` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} set_binary_from_mime_type(cls, is_binary: bool, info: ValidationInfo) -> bool ``` Set is\_binary based on mime\_type if not explicitly set. #### `read` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} read(self) -> str | bytes ``` Read the file content. ### `HttpResource` A resource that reads from an HTTP endpoint. **Methods:** #### `read` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} read(self) -> str | bytes ``` Read the HTTP content. ### `DirectoryResource` A resource that lists files in a directory. **Methods:** #### `validate_absolute_path` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} validate_absolute_path(cls, path: Path) -> Path ``` Ensure path is absolute. #### `list_files` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} list_files(self) -> list[Path] ``` List files in the directory. #### `read` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} read(self) -> str ``` Read the directory listing.
